quotes.quoteText: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
You can observe a lot just by watching.
A house divided against itself cannot stand.
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
There are several good way to earn money. But Driving Job is the best
Tu devrais aussi me voir parler en Français ...
Be positive man. I know you can do it
I believe you. You are all in good progress
